thread.section_title: The Ampersand Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Bit of a disappointment
thread.title_full: Bit of a disappointment - Review of The Ampersand Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: MayHol
title: Bit of a disappointment
text:
Nice hotel, rooms are nice but had to ask multiple times for an iron ( a pretty simple request) and over priced for what it is.
I would expect better service from a hotel of this level, in terms of pricing, when you are above 200 per night I would expect more attention to detail.
